element.name: TFillThread.CollectResult
element.short: Stores the generated voxel-data in a buffer and fetches the amount of voxels in that buffer
element.descr:
This method stores the generated voxel-data in the OpenGL-buffer specified by vertexbuffer and writes the voxelcount to the Cardinal pointed at by pvoxelcount.
TLoadedChunk calls this when finished is true, since all OpenGL-calls have to be made from the main-thread.
